SEARCH
Package controller

Class PatientController

Object
PatientController
public class PatientController extends Object
The PatientController class provides Patient with methods for scheduling, rescheduling, and cancelling appointments, viewing scheduled and past appointments, searching for doctors, and printing bills and providing ratings for completed appointments.

It depends on Appointment, AppointmentOutcomeRecord, Bill, Doctor, Patient, AppointmentOutcomeRecordStore, AppointmentStore, DoctorStore, and PatientStore.

  • Method Details

    • getAppointmentSlots

      public static List<Date> getAppointmentSlots(String doctorId) throws Exception
      Gets the list of available appointment slots for the doctor with the specified user ID.
      Parameters:
      doctorId - the user ID of the doctor
      Returns:
      the list of available appointment slots for the doctor
      Throws:
      Exception - if the doctor is not found

    • scheduleAppointment

      public static Appointment scheduleAppointment(String patientId, String doctorId, Date date) throws Exception
      Schedules an appointment for a patient with a doctor on the specified date.
      Parameters:
      patientId - the user ID of the patient
      doctorId - the user ID of the doctor
      date - the date of the appointment
      Returns:
      the scheduled PENDING appointment
      Throws:
      Exception - if the patient is not found, the doctor is not found, or the doctor is not available on the specified date

    • rescheduleAppointment

      public static Appointment rescheduleAppointment(String patientId, String appointmentId, Date newDate) throws Exception
      Reschedules an appointment for a patient to the new date.
      Parameters:
      patientId - the user ID of the patient
      appointmentId - the ID of the appointment
      newDate - the new date of the appointment
      Returns:
      the rescheduled PENDING appointment
      Throws:
      Exception - if the appointment is not found, the patient is not associated with the appointment, the appointment is not PENDING or CONFIRMED, or the doctor is not available on the new date

    • cancelAppointment

      public static void cancelAppointment(String patientId, String appointmentId) throws Exception
      Cancels an appointment for a patient.
      Parameters:
      patientId - the user ID of the patient
      appointmentId - the ID of the appointment
      Throws:
      Exception - if the appointment is not found, the patient is not associated with the appointment, or the appointment is not PENDING or CONFIRMED

      Returns:
      the list of scheduled appointments for the patient
      Throws:
      Exception - if the patient is not found

      appointmentId - the ID of the appointment
      Returns:

      Throws:

      Returns:

    • printBill

      public static String printBill(String userId, String appointmentId) throws Exception
      Prints the bill for a patient's COMPLETED appointment.
      Parameters:
      userId - the user ID of the patient
      appointmentId - the ID of the appointment
      Returns:
      the printable bill for the appointment in String
      Throws:
      Exception - if the appointment is not found, the patient is not associated with the appointment, or the appointment is not COMPLETED

    • provideRating

      public static void provideRating(String patientId, String appointmentId, int rating) throws Exception
      Provides the rating score for a patient's COMPLETED appointment.
      Parameters:
      patientId - the user ID of the patient
      appointmentId - the ID of the appointment
      rating - the rating score
      Throws:
      Exception - if the rating is not between 1 and 5, the appointment is not found, the patient is not associated with the appointment, or the appointment is not COMPLETED or has already been rated
